info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 3:42PM CDT until August 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River at Austin affecting Mower County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River near Lansing affecting Mower County.
.Rainfall amounts Saturday night into Sunday morning were in the 3 to 5 inch range, with amounts in the City of Austin around 1 to 2 inches. This precipitation is expected to route into area waterways and bring the Cedar River above flood stage. These forecasts include an additional 0.5 to 0.75 inches of precipitation expected Sunday night into Monday morning. If additional precipitation amounts exceed these amounts, the river may rise above the current forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar River near Lansing.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 21.2 feet, Water reaches the bottom of the County Road 2 Bridge.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon by noon CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING
